title: LG’s new karaoke-ready party speaker uses AI to remove song vocals
description: LG is adding a karaoke-focused party speaker to its lineup of Xboom devices, which is built in collaboration with Will.i.am. Announced this week, LG says the Stage 501 speaker comes with an "AI Karaoke Master" that can remove or adjust vocals from "virtually any song," similar to the Soundcore Rave 3S. It can also adjust [...]

title: Datavault AI (NASDAQ:DVLT) Shares Down 20% on Insider Selling
description: Datavault AI Inc. (NASDAQ:DVLT – Get Free Report) traded down 20% on Tuesday after an insider sold shares in the company. The company traded as low as $0.51 and last traded at $0.5165. 102,913,195 shares were traded during trading, an increase of 314% from the average session volume of 24,834,113 shares.
